posts.post_content:
Recent pickup that I don’t need at all. I just thought it was nice to see a 350 with good color as they always seem washed out.

Card is really nice in hand. No creases on this guy and the image and color are great. 

Asking $SOLD for him.  Available via PM to discuss or you can email me at [url]thromdog@hotmail.com[/url]

Thanks for looking!
